item.title: FL
item.description: score:-42 Chances: Foot Locker, Inc. has the potential for a strong recovery in 2023 tied to higher promotional activity and inventory reductions. Risks: Nike stock fell after the company warned of flagging sales growth and outlined $2 billion in cost cuts, indicating potential challenges for the athletic retail industry.
